content: crochet baby mittens in this step-by-step tutorial i will teach you how to crochet these quick and easy mittens these make a perfect gift but don t forget to crochet a pair for yourself as well this pattern uses two easy crochet stitches the single_crochet single_crochet and the slip_stitch slip_stitch making it the perfect pattern for beginners supplies -7 00mm crochet hook -stitch markers -scissors -darning needs -lion brand wool ease thick & quick yarn
